website_summaries.verdict: This model includes Samsung's outstanding picture quality and slightly better technology than similar models.
pros: Offers phenomenal 4K images in a slim, flat-screen smart TV
Very easy to set up, and interface is simple to navigate
Possibly the best 4K Samsung TV on the market
cons: Side viewing angles are not the best for some viewers
Glitches in software causing lag have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new model, but is new garbage
customer_reviews.text: Amazon touted this TV as "The Newer Model", but upon further inspection this is not a good thing. I ended up switching to 2019's Series 8 by Samsung, which doubles performance on this TV, double refresh rate at 120 hz, 5 more inches and just an all around better TV for less money. Cannot recommend against this TV enough.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Purchased and returned
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and recieved. Spent 2 hours on the phone with Samsung to be told that they don't know what's wrong with it. Tv wants me to connect to the Smartthings app but won't give the option to connect to wifi first. Huge waste of time. Literally buying anything else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were better...same old same ol’
customer_reviews.text: Thought this TV was the “new model” with the “latest and best technology” but that’s not the case. Same just cheaper but also it’s picture quality is not great and the sound is terrible. Spend a little more and get an older higher end model or go LG
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jasin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good TV for the price (43 in)
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup, excellent 4k picture from 4k source, excellent upsampling from 1080p, I think I am ready for new game consoles coming in the fall (hopefully). I don't understand people giving it bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: GreyAlien

customer_reviews.title: Best TV Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best TV ever! I took my time to research for a great tv for our new home. Go with this one without a doubt! Amazing picture quality, remote control is very chic, love the brightness - it has a sensor controlling the brightness of the tv depending on the light of the room throughout the day. We love the ambiance mode feature - see the picture. Check the quality of the colors in the video attached. Also, get the right screws if you are mounting the tv on the wall. Hope my review helps you make a decision. I suggest to get a sound bar to take the sound to the next leve.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Prado

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bad picture quality and i wasn't expecting this since it's part of samsung's QLED even though it is their lower end model, picture is even worst than my old MU7000 which is very strange since if you compare the two spec by spec you would think the Q60T would have the better picture, but side by side though it's a different story, also tv starting getting dark spots after a couple of days ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: ABLE C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it sucks
customer_reviews.text: If you have a window near by you will see the reflection very bad In the screen. If I can I would return and buy another tv
customer_reviews.author: ruben kachian

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be mounted, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: This TV cannot be mounted as is and customer service is incapable of providing accurate support about this fact or where to buy a proper mounting kit. Buy a Vizio, they can be mounted hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow Loading
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th Samsung TV in our home and by far the worst. If I could return it to Amazon I would but unfortunately going back and forth with Samsung tech support extended past the 30-day return window. Samsung support came out to replace the processor on our TV and it still is extremely slow loading of Hulu, Prime, Netflix, etc. Samsung initially did remote diagnostics and said there is nothing wrong with the TV despite these loading issues. They checked the internet speed and it was excellent. Even navigating between apps using the remote takes upwards as 3 seconds for the TV to react. Perhaps we received a lemon... but an expensive lemon we are now stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality picture for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This 43 inch QLED exceeded our expectations. We are using it in a bedroom and the picture quality is outstanding. I used the same picture settings as my larger QLED and the 43 inch looks almost the same. Very satisfied with the Apps available. We also like the fact that you can go directly to Amazon Prime with a single button push on the remote. Overall, very satisfied with this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick/Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: It meets my 4K expectations
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is awesome, there are 4 preset for picture quality you can also adjust manually. Remote control is light and slick, not too much buttons also have voice control. The brightness adjust automatically depending in the room. The built in speakers are pretty good with decent bass. Dialogs is pretty clear especially in low volume. It comes with SamsungTV basically it’s free tv channels from the internet, which is nice because I just canceled my very expensive cable tv from Xfinity. It only has 3 HDMI other than that it meets all my TV needs. Watching 4K movies from Netflix and Amazon Prime is very satisfying. You know you’re watching 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Jorrell

customer_reviews.title: Improve operating Manual, pictures & instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to adjust the screen colors. Operation manual reading is very difficult. Couldn’t find how to switch to “dish network” Remote control is not friendly user. UNFORTUNATELY THE ORIGINAL BOX WAS THROWN TO THE GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Pini

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily siloed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that I couldn't add very many additional apps over what it came with, and couldn't figure out how to remove the pre-installed apps that I don't use. The picture is good enough for me, the sound isn't bad. The remote is pretty stupid and seems like a ploy to get you to spend money on a separate remote... but I feel like I paid way too much to be locked into only the content that Samsung decides I should have access to. I really just wanted to be able to install Twitch like on my previous Sony TV. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome TV. Simple setup. Beautiful picture. Perfect addition to my Man Cave. The picture clarity is unbelievable. Buy it and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture is pretty good. I like the built-in Apple TV app. All other available apps are excellent as well. The 43” QLED is a good TV for my bedroom. It is a slightly better TV than the 43” TCL 4K LED TV that I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ring

customer_reviews.title: Can not connect headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love the TV, but very disappointed with Samsun that there is no place to plug in my Sony Headphones. I don’t know what they were thinking. Every TV before this I was able to use them. Very shortsighted for a 2020 TV!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Bought two 43inchers to replace 10 year old LCD Tvs
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two secondary tvs with new 43" QLED Q60Ts. Great, versatile tv for bedroom and office usage. Very bright in well lit rooms. Both units are wall mounted - and require long M8-40MM bolts to mount. One TV is connected to a Nvidia Shield and with CEC, they communicate tightly and you can use either remote to navigate. The other TV doubles as a computer monitor and works great. Putting it into perspective, the Q60T is a mid-tier QLED, edge lit TV. It doesn't quite compare to my 65" top of the line Samsung 4K/HDR tv in my family room - but it was 1/5 of the price and 1/3 of size - and used differently.
customer_reviews.author: D. Crazy 9abst

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and sound great worth buying 75” they deliver and place it inside which I thought was very nice other delivery would just leave it outside
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very clear picture, mine is antenna fed, gets about 56 channels on the over the air antenna.
customer_reviews.text: When using over the air antenna and have guide on screen, while watching a channel it shows channel, like pic in pic, in upper corner, and when scrolling up and down thru guide, sometimes changes the channel being watched. Don't know why but not a big problem. I live about 50 miles from city and get plenty of channels with GE Stealth Antenna fed into amplifier fed to Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jon.Warren

customer_reviews.title: Tv great set up a mess
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with product support offered when you try to put in call back number the area will not allow you to put number there is no way to move to different areas for different parts of your number. Finally got tv to see HDMI 1 only took two hours sti l haven't gotten volume on Directv remote to work. Called 800for Samsung sent me to txt chat but 10 minutes later with no response hung up and worked on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dual led, Good grey scales
customer_reviews.text: Great color and black. Dual led is final tech in lcd tv. Samsung next tv goes to qd oled. But this tv series remains top lcd tv for good grey scales like panasonic kuro in pdp. Also the astonishing price, I recommend this. I used this a few months and I knew this tv Ai upscaling is fantastic. James bond series in 60’s made by 1080p is really looked in 4k and sharp detail pictures. I recommend tv menu in picture expert setting ‘contrast enhancer’ set by ‘weak’
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Picture and Sound and a lousy UI and remote
customer_reviews.text: The 58 inch model fits really well on a mantle over the fireplace and it's very good value. I do not at all like the Smart TV UI but I suppose it's better than LG's, and the remote is poor as well. But what I see and hear once I labor through the designed-in poor access, I am very happy with. None of my other Smart TVs are much better on the UI-remote front, so I am happy for the trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I returned this TV because it was defective
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy another TV, but can't until it is credited back to my gift card. What is causing the delay?
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen better picture from Samsung. I was somewhat disappointed with the picture quality. It took many adjustments to get the picture look okay.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: SmartThings was useless.  Alexa link incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: The SmartThings was useless. Linking my Alexa could not include TV channel changes, pause or play commands, possibly due to incompatibility with my Spectrum setup. They should resolve such matters before marketing. Difficult to find commands, such as recording or DVR access, with remote.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Tabakin

customer_reviews.title: Something nice and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The delivery crew was awesome and the tv is very nice 👍🏾 especially the voice interface and Alexa control! Remote lost no problems Alexa turn on family room tv! We love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to break
customer_reviews.text: When UPS delivered TV, screen was broken and it did not show anything. later on when we bought similar model in retail store - TV just turned off and it was impossible to torun it on, neighter by remote nor manually. Don't waste your money and time on this model. Buy SONY Bravia of the same size and specs instead.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Kats

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of the box
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Amazon customer service was great. They responded quickly and resolved the issue by sending a replacement. Bravo! Picture has tons of lines and what looks like cracks in it but not the physical surface. Just the digital picture. First time out of the box. No damage to the box either. Turned it on for the first time and thought it was a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Georgenes

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has come a long way!
customer_reviews.text: This smart set was relatively easy to set up with the sound bar. The newer remote is intuitive and easy to use. From the box, on the wall and watching in two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Mank

customer_reviews.title: TV did not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv due the good reviews, and Im sure it is a great product...if it works. I tried all the trouble-shooting recommendations, along with contacting Samsung directly. No matter how many times I tried different outlets/reseting, it would not turn on (or show signs that it could). Definitely a bummer, and a hassle to return! I will be going into a store for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Steller

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to navigate
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Samsung TV. The picture does not compare to what I had 6 six years ago. But, it's impossible to navigate. I spend too long to find what I want to watch. The link to Amazon ear buds is problematic and not clear. I recommend you do not buy this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Telly!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new telly! Upgraded from an older (5 year old) Samsung Television and I love the clarity and brightness of the picture. Picture quality is very clear and colors are vibrant. Love the tiny remote that includes features that work my FireStick and Amazon Prime Video as well as my cable. The remote is sleek and intuitive. However, I do miss the numbers on the actual remote.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna-Rae K  Burger

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday TV!
customer_reviews.text: We have this tv in our bedroom and living room, different sizes of course! We love it. Great picture quality, great sound, and most of all we love the cord clips that help hide the cords and organize them. Highly recommend for anyone not super picky about TVs and just looking for something simple to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for an elderly relative who lives nearby. He has no complaints so far. I am a fan of Samsung technology and this TV reinforces that opinion.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with the quality of this TV. The peak brightness is dismal and the black uniformity looks like a budget TV. Returned without question. Don’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Mize

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Screen
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, but these new 4K TVs aren't built like the ones from just 5 years ago. Extremely fragile screens. Screen busted from my thumb while holding the TV in place to plug in an HDMI in the back. After it happened to me I looked at some reviews for both this model and other 4K TVs, and a lot of people have had issues with fragile screens as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.  Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Great reputation of Samsung TV Needed a TV that would fit over the fireplace. This 58" is perfect. Ordered on line and received in 2 days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This TV has exceeded my expectations. Navigating has taken me a little time to learn and I am still doing that but much of it is just so easy. I am glad I got it. Didn't realize how my 8+year old TV was behind the times! Picture, sound, everything is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered it right into my living room. No damage to box, TV is an amazing, absolutely beautiful picture. Played around with the settings and very impressive interface. Switching between apps is seamless. Glad I bought this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Mully

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts on delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with many missing parts. Missing foot stand, remote control. Shoddy quality control from Samsung and amazon to ship such an expensive product with missing parts. Hoping to receive the missing parts very soon.
customer_reviews.author: lstein

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new but used
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought I was buying a new Qtv only to find out in trying to set it up,it is already registered under a different name with additional apps already downloaded.I kind of feel cheated on this item.
customer_reviews.author: alfred pondo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it except lack of native Google assistant support. It has built-in Alexa though so if that’s enough for you then go for it. I probably have to hook up a ChomeCast to get rich voice control features I want from it.
customer_reviews.author: Keyvan Azami

customer_reviews.title: App interface is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Hulu, Amazon prime, Pluto tv apps are horrible on this tv. I have a cheaper tv and use these apps without a problem. Pluto will not work at all, I have to reboot tv most of the time to get Hulu to work and prime works 25% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Reasonably Priced QLED TB
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are so many negative reviews. I had the TV mounted to the wall and setup within an hour. The picture is great and the price was good for the size and quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Remote is absolutely impossible to open!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the TV today. One remark/question : who was responsible for the remote design? This person need to be fired. It's absolutely impossible to open. If the quality of other components similar to remote, both tv and soundbar are heading to return.
customer_reviews.author: q345q

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price,
customer_reviews.text: Needed a smaller tv and this one while it doesn’t have high refresh rate or gaming features it has a pretty impressive picture quality. The eARC is a bit finicky with my Yamaha receiver but not a deal breaker. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly impressed with this purchase.  Very good picture quality & sound for price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase, picture quality is very good. Just have to figure out how to use Alexa. Was apprehensive after reading reviews but felt better after purchasing the extended warranty that covers lightning surges and has tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Flojocro

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung tv is great. The picture quality is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: gordon wilde

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Smart high def 43” Samsung I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Fred Varrecchia

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than the Samsung Crystal UHD
customer_reviews.text: Not any better than the Samsung Crystal UHD and twice the price. Tried them both side by side.
customer_reviews.author: ryan m

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite picture and great value.
customer_reviews.text: What an extraordinary picture. Colors are powerfully rich and true and the picture is vivid and crisp. The upgrading to 4K is as perfect as if the movies were actually produced in 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Donald F. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy from side angle
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't quite hear the dialogue on our old Visio plasma TV so bought this hoping that the sound would be better. It is but not great. I was hoping for a WOW picture but I'm not sure it's any better. It's definitely fuzzy from a side angle. The feet are awkward unless you have a large tv stand. Dual QLED sounded so promising. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Symons

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have schedule wake timer or "on timer"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tv because someone commented that there is on timer feature... it looks like samsung doesn't have this feature anymore... only LG has on timer on their tv? THIS TV ONLY HAVE SLEEP TIMER!
customer_reviews.author: Ceorl Yip

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you have money to blow.
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with the TV and features. I would return it if it weren't for the fact it's so bulky. I'll take the loss and keep it around as a second TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Audio Delay
customer_reviews.text: The audio on delay on this tv is horrifical. Even with the output the delay set to 0, it is very behind the picture. The picture is decent, but the decent picture with the terrible audio makes this an expensive piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: wall mount problem
customer_reviews.text: Ability to attach this unit to a wall mount is very poorly addressed in the Manual. Furthermore calls to Samsung was not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: John M Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Returned
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this TV, defective out of the box and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Big James

customer_reviews.title: Alexa is not handsfree
customer_reviews.text: Having built in Alexa is deceptive. You must have the remote and hold down the button in order for it to work. There is no "alexa do this"
customer_reviews.author: Zachary B Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Really great color and picture. Not the lowest cost option but a very nice TV.
customer_reviews.author: Over Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Youtube TV
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the new Samsung remote. I ordered an older remote to use with the tv, one with numbers.
customer_reviews.author: wolfpacker68

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and have had it a few days now. The picture quality is amazing. Sound is great. I thought I would have to use a sound bar but I dont think it needs it, at least not for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Goss

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent experience
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to figure out the operation of the remote. The television is fantastic. The delivery of the television was on time by two very helpful Amazon employees.
customer_reviews.author: Charles King

customer_reviews.title: Qled
customer_reviews.text: I love my Qled! Best picture on a TV! I now own 2
customer_reviews.author: CarolG

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and navigate to the various apps. Picture is crisp and colors bright. Good price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: Great tv and apps with it. I also like the free Samsung plus Channels!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this model tv.
customer_reviews.text: Bad brightness, some scenes are almost totally black. This is second tv and same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Blank Name

customer_reviews.title: Not supported by Xfinity
customer_reviews.text: Not supported yet by my cable provider (Xfinity). Had to ba ROKU to stream the signal...
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tv. Great picture and sound! Overall quality good and great price on a QLED
customer_reviews.author: Allen P.

customer_reviews.title: TV is great.
customer_reviews.text: The TV is fantastic- great picture. Ordered it on Thursday, got it on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: No hassles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described .came promptly with no sign of damage Amazon driver assisted in bringing it into the house
customer_reviews.author: Michael Klein

customer_reviews.title: samsung tv is amazing
customer_reviews.text: samsung TV is amazing. The resolution is so good, very user friendly. I loved it .
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Valencia

customer_reviews.title: FAST shipping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV on amazon day and it was at my house 2 days later, no damage!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture!
customer_reviews.text: Best tv ever purchased. Beautiful quality! I’d recommend to anyone. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my fiance luvs it...huge  improvement from an upgraded LG
customer_reviews.text: Pixel quality are a plus..was hoping for a (49/50'')...purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.author: L Hanfield

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Remote is too small and only one came with the TV
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is "sheerness"?
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient, easy to use, I love it! What is "sheerness'?
customer_reviews.author: Grace Jeanne Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great TV but driver delivered it to the wrong door!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

product_meta.title: SAMSUNG 43-inch Class QLED Q60T Series - 4K UHD Dual LED Quantum HDR Smart TV with Alexa Built-in (QN43Q60TAFXZA, 2020 Model)
product_meta.description: Style:TV Only| Size:43-InchEnter a world saturated with color and sharpened to refreshing clarity, all of it made possible through the power of Quantum Dot technology. An intuitive Smart TV interface learns what you like and suggests exciting new content. And if you’re into gaming, Game Enhancer automatically neutralizes annoyances like tearing and stuttering. DISCLAIMERS: *QLED televisions can produce 100% Color Volume in the DCI-P3 color space, the format for most cinema screens and HDR movies for television.
feature_bullets: 100% COLOR VOLUME WITH QUANTUM DOT*: Quantum dots produce over a billion shades of color that stay true-to-life even in bright scenes.
DUAL LED: A system of dedicated warm and cool LED backlights enhance contrast details.
QUANTUM HDR: Expands the range of color and detail beyond what's possible on HDTVs.
SMART TV POWERED BY TIZEN: Go beyond Smart TV with next-gen apps, super easy control, and a host of enhancements that elevate the TV watching experience.
QUANTUM PROCESSOR 4K LITE: This ultra-fast processor optimizes content for QLED and transforms everything you watch into stunning 4K.

ALEXA BUILT-IN: Ask more from your TV. Just ask Alexa to open apps, change the channel, search for movies and shows, play music, control your smart home devices and more. To talk to Alexa, press and hold the mic button on your remote.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars405 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
